thread.title: Shetland celebrates the Up Helly Aa Viking fire festival
thread.title_full: Shetland celebrates the Up Helly Aa Viking fire festival

title: Shetland celebrates the Up Helly Aa Viking fire festival
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Shetland celebrates the Up Helly Aa Viking fire festival 31 January 2017 Last updated at 23:19 GMT 
The annual Up Helly Aa Viking fire festival has been celebrated in Shetland. 
Some 60 "Vikings" paraded through Lerwick, trailed by more than 900 torchbearers known as "guizers". 
The celebration culminated in the traditional burning of a galley. Mike Grundon reports from Lerwick.
